question: Which of the following refers to Khalisa land?
option1: Lands assigned to officials in lieu of salary.
option2: Land given as grant to religious institutions.
option3: Land under the direct control of the Sultan.
answer: Land under the direct control of the Sultan.
explanation: Khalisa land was the land which was under the direct control of the Sultan. All the revenues collected from the Khalisa land were spent for the maintenance of royal court and royal household.
